ygData.subject: Assorted things
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hi there!  Glad to see you on the list, and thanks for letting us know about the stages! Right now, one of the other Gladiator fans is trying to put
ygData.rawEmail:
X-Digest-Num: 43
Message-ID: <17248.43.122.959279670@...>
Date: Fri, 20 Aug 1999 20:08:15 -0400
From: Tom Ricket <tricket@...
Subject: Assorted things


>From: Light4700@...
>
>Hi!  I just Joined to this list. I love gladiator.  I have been using the 
>editor recently and I have built some challenging stages.  If you would 
>like a copy.  E-mail me.  My favorite character is the Cleric.  I can't 
>wait until the new Gladiator-Beyond Freedom comes out.  Well. See you 
>all.  Write Back

Hi there!  Glad to see you on the list, and thanks for letting us know 
about the stages! Right now, one of the other Gladiator fans is trying to 
put together a page that will hold a list of many user-created levels, also!

>From: AmyVan133@...
>
>Hello! It's great to finally here from somone who sounds as excited about
>gladiator as me. How long have you been playing it? Me, about 6mths or so. It
>is really a awesome game! Have you ever played gauntlet? I just started
>playing that on the playstation version. I would love to hear more about your
>new stages! bye!

I've probably mentioned this before, but we (the Gladiator team) definitely 
like Gauntlet -- the original version (way back in 1984, or so) helped give 
us ideas about how we wanted Gladiator to be!

See ya, guys!

--Tom
